title: Tensei Shitara Akari dake Suraimu datta ken
original_name: 転生したらあかりだけスライムだった件
sinopse:
After an accident with a VR game, the Amusement Club members are teleported to a fantasy world with MMORPG elements. After regaining consciousness, Akari Akaza discovers that she has been reincarnated as a Slime.

Source: Kodansha's Suiyōbi no Sirius / YuruYuri Wiki
